english.segment1: "the steps of faith fall on the seeming void, but find the rock beneath.". -john g. whittier
english.segment2: i guess i thought a letter would be less confusing. so for your eyes i write another waterlogged excuse. toil and turn and watch another secret burn. controlling words is just something i just wasn't born to do. there is a secret beneath you
english.segment3: in my silence i defend my common sense. and i see through all the stupid things i do
english.segment4: it's hard to write a letter with an open mind. when all i saw was underneath a satisfied embrace. that exposed your wondrous face
english.segment5: in my silence i defend my common sense. as i'm walking along my familiar fence. and i see though all the stupid things i do. and that this path i'm on will never lead to you
english.segment6: in my silence i defend my common sense. as i'm walking along my familiar fence. and i see though all the stupid things i do. and that this path i'm on will never lead to you. and i'm looking back to only see a spark. as i finally take a step into the dark
